DataElement.preferredName: Prostate Erection Occurrence Prostate Frequency Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value to represent the interference from prostate cancer symptoms with rate of occurrence for hardening, enlarging and rising of the penis indicating arousal in males.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Prostate Quality of Life Erection Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: related to changes in rate of occurrence for hardening, enlarging and rising of the penis indicating arousal in males due to interference from symptoms of prostate cancer.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A gland in the male reproductive system just below the bladder. It surrounds part of the urethra, the canal that empties the bladder. It produces a fluid that forms part of semen. (NCI-GLOSS):The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life.  The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness.

Concepts.definition: The walnut shaped accessory sex gland of the male reproductive system. It is located in the pelvis just below the bladder, surrounding the prostatic part of the urethra. The prostate gland secretes a fluid which is part of the semen.

The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life. The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness.

Property.preferredDefinition: Erection is the hardening, enlarging and rising of the penis which often occurs in the sexually aroused male.:Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: The hardening, enlarging and rising of the penis which often occurs in the sexually aroused male.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: information on quality of patient life and ability to function

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: a scaled set of values rating interference of prostate cancer symptoms with frequency of occurrence for erection in sexual activity.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: I had an erection ABOUT HALF the time I wanted one

ValueMeaning.preferredName: I had an erection ABOUT HALF the time I wanted one
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective response indicating that an individual has or had an erection about half the time when they wanted one.

Concepts.longName: Have Erection About Half the Time
Concepts.definition: A subjective response indicating that an individual has or had an erection about half the time when they wanted one.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: I had an erection LESS THAN HALF the time I wanted one

ValueMeaning.preferredName: I had an erection LESS THAN HALF the time I wanted one
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective response indicating that an individual has or had an erection less than half the time when they wanted one.

Concepts.longName: Have Erection Less Than Half the Time
Concepts.definition: A subjective response indicating that an individual has or had an erection less than half the time when they wanted one.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: I had an erection MORE THAN HALF the time I wanted one

ValueMeaning.preferredName: I had an erection MORE THAN HALF the time I wanted one
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective response indicating that an individual has or had an erection more than half the time when they wanted one.

Concepts.longName: Have Erection More Than Half the Time
Concepts.definition: A subjective response indicating that an individual has or had an erection more than half the time when they wanted one.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Being approximately average or within certain limits; conforming with or constituting a norm or standard or level or type or social norm.

Concepts.definition: Being approximately average or within certain limits; conforming with or constituting a norm or standard or level or type or social norm.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: I NEVER had an erection when I wanted one

ValueMeaning.preferredName: I NEVER had an erection when I wanted one
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective response indicating that an individual never has or had an erection when they wanted one.

Concepts.longName: Never Have Erection When Want One
Concepts.definition: A subjective response indicating that an individual never has or had an erection when they wanted one.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.
